price: 68 Je me contente de vous transmettre le message de mon Seigneur et suis, pour vous, un fidèle conseiller.
arabic: أُبَلِّغُكُمۡ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّي وَأَنَا۠ لَكُمۡ نَاصِحٌ أَمِينٌ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: uballighukum risālāti rabbī wa-anā lakum nāṣiḥun amīnun
